item.title:
Hi pals, made a lil mistake so there is more copies of TAH VOL.2 left than i thought (from 2 to ... 6! whew) so if you want to get your hands a copy before they are discontinued this is the time:

item.title: Here‚Äôs the glamour of my Met Gala watching: I‚Äôm about to finish my 2nd gin. I‚Äôve decided on a whim to cook some chicken nuggets. I‚Äôm trying not the wake my family. I can hear my younger brother speaking on Skype (to whom? It‚Äôs 3am!), so clearly he doesn‚Äôt have my same concerns.
item.dc:creator: @TabloidArtHist

item.title:
a more abstract parallel, but I love how the dress offers similar features in its cut and texture, and helps to add further drama to the poses, giving it this distinct 1920s feel!
Constance Wu at the 2019 #MetGala #MetCamp // Actress Anna May Wong, c. 1920s
item.dc:creator: @TabloidArtHist
